LanguageData.EnvironmentDarkGood.stages.0.label: 处于黑暗中
LanguageData.EnvironmentDarkGood.stages.0.description: I've been in the dark for a while. I like it。
LanguageData.CabinFeverGood.stages.0.label: 幽居病 (中等)
LanguageData.CabinFeverGood.stages.0.description: I've been cooped up inside for days. The way I like it。
LanguageData.CabinFeverGood.stages.1.label: 幽居病 (严重)
LanguageData.CabinFeverGood.stages.1.description: I've been safely inside for so long now. Can this get any better?
